hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Upper Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Bug Bottle# and #a Deku Stick#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Did you know that there's a 1/201 chance per Rupee that the Zora from the diving minigame tosses a 500 Rupee?^Keep winning and the odds go up!

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #5# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Spike Walls Left Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Boss Key Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.
